name: pixu-talks-libraries
description: A monorepo for my talks, including common slides snippets and styles
author: Emiliano Pisu <pisuemiliano.1980@gmail.com>

scripts.rel:push: git add . && git commit --amend --no-edit && git push && git push --tags
scripts.rel:patch: lerna publish patch && yarn version --patch --no-git-tag-version && yarn rel:push
scripts.rel:minor: lerna publish minor && yarn version --minor --no-git-tag-version && yarn rel:push
scripts.rel:major: lerna publish major && yarn version --major --no-git-tag-version && yarn rel:push
